mapper.insert: insert into async_image_item ( item_id, item_name, price, description ) values ( async_image_item_seq.nextval, #{item_name}, #{price}, #{description} )
mapper.select: select item_id, item_name, price, description from async_image_item where item_id = #{itemId}
select item_id, item_name, price, description from async_image_item where item_id > 0 order by item_id desc
